Package org.example.model

Class ServicePoint

java.lang.Object
org.example.model.ServicePoint
public class ServicePoint extends Object
Represents a service point in the bank simulation system. Manages customer queuing, service timing, and statistics collection.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ServicePoint(ContinuousGenerator generator, EventList eventList, EventType type)
    Creates a new service point with specified service time distribution.

    • ServicePoint

      public ServicePoint(ContinuousGenerator generator, EventList eventList, EventType type)
      Creates a new service point with specified service time distribution.
      Parameters:
      generator - Service time distribution generator
      eventList - Event scheduling system
      type - Type of departure event for this service point

  • Method Details

    • addQueue

      public void addQueue(Customer a)
      Adds a customer to the service queue and records queue entry time.
      Parameters:
      a - Customer to be added to queue

    • beginService

      public void beginService()
      Starts serving the next customer in queue. Updates timing statistics and schedules departure event.

    • removeQueue

      public Customer removeQueue()
      Removes and returns the served customer from queue. Updates service statistics.
      Returns:
      The customer who completed service

    • getQueueCustomers

      public List<Customer> getQueueCustomers()
      Gets a defensive copy of the current queue.
      Returns:
      List of customers currently in queue

    • isReserved

      public boolean isReserved()
      Checks if the service point is currently serving a customer.
      Returns:
      True if the service point is serving a customer

    • isOnQueue

      public boolean isOnQueue()
      Checks if the service point has customers waiting in queue.
      Returns:
      True if the service point has customers in queue

    • getQueueLength

      public int getQueueLength()
      Gets the number of customers currently waiting in queue.
      Returns:
      Number of customers in queue

    • getAverageServiceTime

      public double getAverageServiceTime()
      Calculates the average service time per customer.
      Returns:
      Average service time in simulation units

    • getAverageQueueTime

      public double getAverageQueueTime()
      Calculates the average time customers spend in queue.
      Returns:
      Average queue waiting time in simulation units

    • getServedCustomers

      public int getServedCustomers()
      Gets the total number of customers served by this service point.
      Returns:
      Total number of customers served
